name: Unidentified_Vak_curator
content: A female member of the Vak species served as the curator of an art gallery on the Vak Combine nation's capital planet Primea. She wore a loose-fitting tunic-skirt and a sash across her chext decorated with a double row of carved wooden pins. Around 19 BBY, when the Chiss Mitth'raw'nuruodo "Thrawn" and Thalias visited the Vak's art gallery, she spoke something harsh in her language about the Chiss wearing hoods and briefly discussed if Nikardun General Yiv was a friend of the Vaks before being ordered away by the curator after he inquired how the Vak philosophy affected the lives of the common people.
